metadata.synopsis: Players are trying to interact with a painting while the aura of an evil Judged blocks them from doing so.
metadata.how_to_trigger: In BGO_Main_A, teleport to 'The Cell' - S_WYR_PaintingPuzzle_SolutionPainting3 - 38e88703-d24d-462e-8032-98a2d77465d4 - (-906 28 -1016) and click on it.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: The shadows are blocking me. I need to get rid of them - somehow.
